text: Futhi (khumbulani) ngesikhathi uMose ethandaza (ecelela) abantu bakhe amanzi sabe sesithi shaya idwala ngenduku yakho kwaqhuma imithombo eyishumi nambili kulona, bayazi bonke abantu indawo yabo yokuphuza, yidlani futhi niphuze kulokho enikwabelwe nguMvelinqangi ningenzi ukona nokuganga emhlabeni
